main event: An unidentified flying object that was described as a vivid red-orange sphere was observed over Barbados, BWI on 7 March 1962.
interesting points: The object was about 30 feet in diameter and displayed erratic maneuvering, appearing to be under intelligent control., The object was observed for 3 to 5 minutes before disappearing from view., The witness reported a rapid approach at an estimated speed of 600-800 mph., This sighting was shared by several neighbors and friends who discussed it afterwards., Telephonic information was received from an unnamed source regarding the sighting the same evening.
witness description: a vacationer in Barbados, along with several neighbors and friends
